Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides a range of advocacy services in Sheffield for adults with a learning disability. Offers self-advocacy through organising the People's Parliament, a newsletter group, a Thursday group and Wednesday sub-group. Provides training and consultation on learning disabilities issues and sits on steering groups. Has paid advocates, peer advocates and volunteers offering one-to-one advocacy services and support with a range of issues. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 05369342.
